   Facebook posts
   stated on May 31, 2019 in a Facebook post:
   Says presidential candidate Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand said, "Social Security
   must (be) expanded to illegal immigration, it’s their right."

A viral Facebook post misrepresents Gillibrand’s words, claiming she said
   illegal immigrants should receive Social Security benefits without paying
   into the system.

The post misspells Gillibrand’s first name as "Kristen" and then goes on
   to claim that she said, "Social Security must (be) expanded to illegal
   immigration, it’s their right."

Our ruling

   A Facebook post claims Sen. Gillibrand said "Social Security must (be)
   expanded to illegal immigration, it’s their right," suggesting that
   immigrants should receive those benefits for free.
